hanzi-su-wiki:
債

Значения

Долг, задолженность

Мнемоника

Свойство раба 亻 быть в вечном долгу и под угрозой наказания 責.

Варианты

债

zhài
debt; Classifiers: 笔
долг; Классификаторы: ручка
rtega_mnemonic:
債債RSdebt, loan, obligation
  • a person's 亻 obligation or debt 責
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 债)
Ideographic: A person's 亻 duty 責; 責 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
債務 [ zhài wù ]: debt; liability; amount due; indebtedness
債券 [ zhài quàn ]: bond; debenture
債權 [ zhài quán ]: creditor's rights (law)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 責 [ zé ] one's responsibility, duty
heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T's plot of world domination is foiled and he goes in debt from all the money he spent on weapons. Who is to blame? Bond. James Bond.
heisig_constituent: bond, person, blame, grow up, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: Person . . . blame. The key word refers to financial bonds.
koohiiStory1: Bonds are guarnteed by the government so if they fail there is one person you can blame - the prime minister!
koohiiStory2: Mr. T´s plot of world domination is foiled. Who is to blame? Bond. James Bond.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your leader gets the blame if your company is in debt. They're the one who led you all into that debt, so they should get the blame too.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the leader standing up in front of everyone as they blame him. He's holding a plaque with the amount of debt you're all in. Try to imagine what that number would be.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: To pay off this debt your leader says you need to sell your cyborg (さい) to help the company. You fight him! You yell! You scream! The cyborg puts a half-human half-robot hand on your shoulder and shakes its head sadly.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch as your cyborg saves your company, even though it wasn't even his responsibility, from crippling debt. *sob* I can't believe your cyborg is gone!
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 化 (превращаться), ハ, 土 (земля), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) is tortured (責) by his debts
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T knows it is his responsibility to pay off all debts and you better believe he always does.
humanum_short_description_en: The ancient text of " debt " refers to the word " responsibility ", see " responsibility ".

債字的基本解释

債
zhài
见“债”。

債字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhài］
［《廣韻》側賣切，去卦，莊。］
［《廣韻》側革切，入麥，莊。］
“债1”的繁体字。“責1”的今字。
(1)所欠的钱财。
(2)用来喻指应兑现的事情或所造成的损失。
(3)借贷。
(4)索还所欠的钱财。

債字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　債； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页114第26
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?側賣切，齋去聲。【說文】負也。今俗負財曰債。【前漢·鼂錯傳】賣田宅，鬻子孫，以償債。【谷永傳】爲人起債分利受謝。　又通作責。【周禮·天官·小宰】八成經邦治，四曰聽稱責。【戰國策】馮諼爲孟嘗君收責於薛。【史記】作收債。【前漢·高帝紀】歲竟，兩家常折券棄責。讀如債。

債字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
債字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhài］
["Guangyun" sells cut sideways, goes to Gua, Zhuang. ]
["Guangyun" side leather cut, into wheat, Zhuang. ]
Traditional characters for "debt 1". The modern word for "responsibility 1".
(1) The money owed.
(2) It is used to refer to things that should be honored or the losses caused.
(3) Borrowing.
(4) Claim the money owed.
debt
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　 debt; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 114 to 26
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Side selling and cutting, Zhai Qu sound. [Said the text] also negative. Today's common debt is called debt. 【The wrong biography of the former Han·鼂】Sell fields and houses for offspring to pay off debts. [Gu Yong Chuan] Take up debts and share the benefits for others.　Through responsibility again. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Xiao Zai】80% of the state is governed by the state, and the fourth day is to be blamed. [Warring States Policy] Feng Chen took responsibility for Meng Changjun to Xue. 【Historical Records】For debt collection. [Former Han Gao Diji] At the end of the year, the two families often renounce responsibility. Read like a debt.

Name meaning

zhài
вм. 债
Radicals: ｲ, 責  (leader, blame)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your leader gets the blame if your company is in debt. They're the one who led you all into that debt, so they should get the blame too.
Picture the leader standing up in front of everyone as they blame him. He's holding a plaque with the amount of debt you're all in. Try to imagine what that number would be.
Reading Mnemonic
To pay off this debt your leader says you need to sell your cyborg (さい) to help the company. You fight him! You yell! You scream! The cyborg puts a half-human half-robot hand on your shoulder and shakes its head sadly.
Watch as your cyborg saves your company, even though it wasn't even his responsibility, from crippling debt. *sob* I can't believe your cyborg is gone!
